used_rate_anc.fr: Taux d’utilisation CPN = CPN 1 AS (Nlles inscrites)x 100/ Pop femmes enceintes du mois
used_rate_anc.en: Used rate ANC= ANC 1 AS (new registered)X100/pop monthly pregnant women

pregnacies_at_high_risk_detected.fr: Proportion de grossesses à haut risque détectées = Tot Grossesses à haut risque détectées x 100 / Total Nlles Inscrites
pregnacies_at_high_risk_detected.en: Pregnacies at high risk detected = total pregnancies at high risk detected X100/tota new registered

pregnancies_at_high_risk_avarage_refered.fr: Proportion de grossesses à haut risque référées = Tot Grossesses à haut risque référées x 100 / Total femmes à hauts risques détectées inscrites
pregnancies_at_high_risk_avarage_refered.en: Pregnancies at high risk avarage refered= total pregnanciesat high risk refered X100/total women at high risk detected registered

average_of_women_who_received_at_least_t.fr: Proportion de fe ayant reçu au moins la SP 2 = Nombre de femmes enceintes ayant reçu au moins 2 Quantité de SPX100 / Fe ayant effectué la première visite prénatale
average_of_women_who_received_at_least_t.en: Average of women who received at least the SP2= number of pregnant women Who received at least 2 quantities of SPX100/woman who was visited for the 1st time at ANC

average_of_pregnant_women_who_received_o.fr: Proportion des femmes enceintes ayant reçues une MILD à la CPN = femmes enceintes ayant acquis MILD X 100/ Total CPN1
average_of_pregnant_women_who_received_o.en: Average of pregnant women who received one MILD at ANC= Pregnant woman who required a MILD X100/total ANC 1
